name: B2B-Segmentation-Mail-Generator
parameters: --var industry_type='Automation' --var hq='North America' --var employees='400' --var companies='Name: Acme Corp, Industry: Logistics, Employee Count: 520, HQ: North America, Product Description: Supply Chain and Automation Tools Name: ByteWorks Inc, Industry: Software, Employee Count: 85, HQ: Europe, Product Description: DevOps and deployment acceleration platform Name: Medion Health, Industry: Healthcare, Employee Count: 1,200, HQ: North America, Product Description: AI-based patient record system Name: GreenSpire Energy, Industry: Renewable Energy, Employee Count: 300, HQ: North America, Product Description: Smart grid monitoring solutions Name: NovaBank, Industry: Financial Services, Employee Count: 3,500, HQ: Asia, Product Description: Core banking security infrastructure Name: RouteNest, Industry: Logistics, Employee Count: 150, HQ: North America, Product Description: Fleet route optimization software ' --var product='Product Name: SignalFlow, Description: Real-time GTM Insight platform, Core Value Property: Surface top accounts using external and internal buying signals, Target Buyers: RevOps and Sales leaders, Differentiator: No CRM dependency, deploys in hours'

nodes.name: Account Segment Classifier
nodes.description: This node enables standalone or dataframe-optional LLM queries across multiple providers (OpenAI, Bedrock, Gemini). It is designed for sequential agent flows like 'Similar Company Finder' and supports saving structured responses.

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: customPrompt
fields.value:
You are an Enterprise Firmographic Classifier based on a firm belonging to the industry '${industry_type}' that has '${employees}' employees and has an HQ based in '${hq}'. Provided a list of companies below, compare and classify each of them into one of the following segments:


* 'ICP_Core': High match on industry, region and scale
* 'ICP_Adjacent': Adjacent industries or smaller scale based in the same region
* 'Non_ICP': Does not match industry or region or scale


Company List:
'${companies}'


Output must be a JSON list of objects with the following schema:
Example Response:
[
 {
  "company_name": "Acme Corp",
  "segment": "ICP_Core",
  "segment_tags": ["logistics", "NA", "mid-enterprise"]
  } ... (and so on)
]

nodes.description: This node enables standalone or dataframe-optional LLM queries across multiple providers (OpenAI, Bedrock, Gemini). It is designed for sequential agent flows like 'Similar Company Finder' and supports saving structured responses.

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: customPrompt
fields.value:
You are a Persona Matching Assistant.

Attached will be a list of companies and their traits and segments. Based on them, select the most relevant GTM personas to target for outbound outreach:

Available Personas:
1. RevOps Lead
2. Head of Sales
3. CTO
4. Growth Marketing Lead

Extract the target personas and justify the reason for doing so for each company in the attached list. All companies must be included.

Output must be a JSON list of objects with the following schema:
Example Response:

[
  {
  "company_name": "Acme Corp",
  "target_persona": "RevOps Lead",
  "persona_reason": "Likely responsible for automation initiatives and process improvements in mid-size GTM teams",
 "traits": [
  "Mid-size logistics firm",
  "North America HQ",
  "Focus on automation"
  ],
 "segment": "ICP_Core",
 "segment_tags": ["logistics", "NA", "mid-enterprise"]
  } ...
]

fields.name: customPrompt
fields.value:
You are a Context Compressor & Merger based.

For each company present in the attached list, merge all upstream context into a single JSON blob under 60 words total. Use th

Perform this for each company in the attached list.

Output must be a JSON list of objects with the following schema:

Example Response:
[
  {
  "company_name": "Acme Corp",
  "context_summary": "Mid-size logistics firm in North America focused on automation. ICP_Core match. Targeting RevOps Lead... (so on)",
  }, ...
]

nodes.name: Email Generator
nodes.description: This node enables standalone or dataframe-optional LLM queries across multiple providers (OpenAI, Bedrock, Gemini). It is designed for sequential agent flows like 'Similar Company Finder' and supports saving structured responses.

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: customPrompt
fields.value:
Write a short professional outbound email to each of the companies in the attached list that summarizes the key insights we have from analysis.

You must:
Start with 1-2 relevant traits from 'context_summary'
Introduce the product naturally, using its value property
Speak to the persona, and avoid an overfamiliar tone
Do not reference internal scoring or metadata
Close with a light, optional CTA

You are provided with some product context about what you are willing to sell.
${product}

Write an email for each of the companies mentioned in the attached list.

Output must be a JSON list of objects with the following schema:

Example Response:
[
 {
  "company_name": "Acme Corp",
  "email_body": "Hi team at Acme,\n\nAs a mid-size logistics company focused on automation, your team may be exploring ways to drive more precision in GTM execution. SignalFlow helps RevOps leaders identify high-intent accounts using real-time buying signals all without needing CRM integration.\n\nHappy to share more if this aligns.\n\nBest,\n SignalFlow Team"
  }, ...
]

fields.name: comment
fields.value:
5-Agent chain for a B2B segmentation outreach e-mail generation pipeline.

  • Enterprise Firmographic Classifier - Classifies companies into ICP segments based on industry, region, and size match.
  • GTM Strategy Assistant - Extracts up to 3 company-specific traits to personalize go-to-market messaging.
  • Persona Matching Assistant - Identifies the best-fit persona for outreach based on company traits and segment.
  • Context Compresser & Merger - Creates a compact 60-word summary merging traits, segments, and target persona.
  • Email Generator - Writes concise, personalized outbound emails using company context and product value.
fields.title: Comment
fields.description: Comments for the Workflow
